channel.title: How to add the "Moderator" Player right?
channel.description:
This is both client, and server sided, and I coded my server from scratch. Its a Delta (don't hate) but it's turning out pretty good. Unfortunately it doesn't have the moderator player right. Help? =\
MOVED: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461497.0.html

item.title: How to add the "Moderator" Player right?
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

Teamviewer is free and is only like 3mb. Just download it?

Read full topic

item.title: How to add the "Moderator" Player right?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

iTz Karma:

I cleaned it before I started, and pretty much dumped everything. It’s weird =\

Well than, you might not be writing the playerRights to the client when you login, have you altered the login method?
